# The `ScalarBitSetTraits` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class should be specialized by any integer type that is a union of bit values and the YAML representation is a flow sequence of strings. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename T, typename Enable = void&gt;
struct llvm::yaml::ScalarBitSetTraits&lt;T, Enable&gt;</CodeBlock>

<IncludesList>

</IncludesList>

## Description {#details}

This class should be specialized by any integer type that is a union of bit values and the YAML representation is a flow sequence of strings.

For example: 

<CodeBlock>
 struct ScalarBitSetTraits&lt;MyFlags&gt; &#123;
   static void bitset(IO &amp;io, MyFlags &amp;value) &#123;
     io.bitSetCase(value, &quot;big&quot;,   flagBig);
     io.bitSetCase(value, &quot;flat&quot;,  flagFlat);
     io.bitSetCase(value, &quot;round&quot;, flagRound);
   &#125;
 &#125;; 
</CodeBlock>

Definition at line 123 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/yamltraits-h">YAMLTraits.h</a>.

</DoxygenPage>
